articles.title: Why the average American family's net worth increased 37% during the pandemic - NPR
articles.description: A new survey from the Federal Reserve finds that family finances overall improved in recent years, despite the economic upheaval caused by the pandemic.
articles.content:
Household finances improved between 2019 and 2022, according to a new survey from the Federal Reserve. Home ownership increased, despite a drop in affordability.
Saul Loeb/AFP via Getty Images
